<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Get PIX static BR code EMVQRCPS content"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/pix/brcode/static/{pactualId}/emv"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



This endpoint returns the static BR code instance EMVQRCPS contents.

  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

>
  
</ParamsDetails>
